version_description:
- Bug fixes,
- Ability to change record screen content mode by double tap (devices with screen ratio other than 16x9),
- New icon and splash screen.

添加了进度条中预览当前段。
新增预览期间跳到下一个视频部分，通过点击视频的能力。

- Added ability to trim segments,
- Added ability to save only selected segments,
- Added Instagram sharing,
- Added ability to audio playback of single segments on edit screen,
- Fixed video/audio lag after switching between back/front camera,
- Fixed problem with saving video to camera roll.
